scripts.mac-vuerouter-vanillaextract: rm -rf mac-vuerouter-vanillaextract && npx tsx ../../../packages/create-template/src/index.ts -n mac-vuerouter-vanillaextract -t vue --vf vue-router -c vanilla-extract --use-all-components && cd mac-vuerouter-vanillaextract && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test:unit
scripts.mac-nuxt-vanillaextract: rm -rf mac-nuxt-vanillaextract && npx tsx ../../../packages/create-template/src/index.ts -n mac-nuxt-vanillaextract -t vue --vf nuxt -c vanilla-extract --use-all-components && cd mac-nuxt-vanillaextract && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test:unit

scripts.win-nuxt-vanillaextract: Remove-Item -Path .\win-nuxt-vanillaextract && npx tsx ../../../packages/create-template/src/index.ts -n win-nuxt-vanillaextract -t vue --vf nuxt -c vanilla-extract --use-all-components && cd win-nuxt-vanillaextract && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm test:unit
